remarks: A subset of Hilbert space is orthogonal to the span of the singleton of a projection onto its orthocomplement.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
spansnpj.1 $e |- A C_ ~H $.
spansnpj.2 $e |- B e. ~H $.
spansnpji $p |- A C_ ( _|_ ` ( span ` { ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` A ) ) ` B ) } ) ) $.
